title: Great entry level protein suppliment
text: This product was my entry into the world of protein supplements and by far it has exceeded my expectations. This is made of whey concentrate which compared to the other forms like whey isolate has 80% protein only, but bear in mind unless you are a gym freak 80% protein is sufficient for you as this won't be the only meal you'll have all day. It has a mild sweet taste, which I personally prefer more than a strong sweetness. And if you are wondering about the taste, the chocolate flavour is pretty decent too and you can easily convince yourself it is a chocolate milkshake. It has the essential amino acids and BCAA with nothing that can be harmful for you. Although it is optimized for use with milk I recommend using it with water as whey is already a part of milk and adding milk makes it a thick and a bit slimy, also you can keep the nutritional value from the liquid part of the shake zero with water.The major down point being the amount of carbohydrates in it. Ideally in order to lose weight and make lean muscles carbohydrates should be avoided, unfortunately this should be termed a carb shake with 12 grams of protein but 12.5 grams of carbs per 30g serving.Inside the packet there is a verification code to see if the product is genuine and also a 30g scoop within the powder.On a budget, this is a decent product but not a value for money.
